title.rendered: Oyster Folding Mesh Chair with Upholstered Folding  Arms, White Shell and White Nylon Base

content.rendered:
Our Oyster Folding Mesh Chair with Upholstered Folding  Arms, White Shell and White Nylon Base is perfect for the home office! 

The Oyster comes with Tension Control, Folding Back, Upholstered Padded Arms, Fixed Lumbar Support & 3 colours!

110KG capacity, assembly may be required, all day use. Price is for chair only.

Seat width (mm) 480
Seat depth 480
Seat height 475-575
Back width 450
Back height 530
Height (folded) 660-760
